body_html:
@SsnL Hi, I have the same problem when I load the model which is trained on Pytorch0.4.
The error is ‘num_batches_tracked'.
When the model is created on 0.4.1, there are loads of '*.num_batches_tracked' parameters, which do not exist on 0.4.0.
I have to use 0.4.1, so how can I load the pretrained model?
body_text:
@SsnL  Hi, I have the same problem when I load the model which is trained on Pytorch0.4.
The error is ‘num_batches_tracked'.

I have to use 0.4.1, so how can I load the pretrained model?
body:
@SsnL  Hi, I have the same problem when I load the model which is trained on Pytorch0.4.
The error is ‘num_batches_tracked'.
When the model is created on 0.4.1, there are loads of  '*.num_batches_tracked'  parameters, which do not exist on 0.4.0.
I have to use 0.4.1, so how can I load the pretrained model?
